3: Stop it... I surrender...
Lamia barely resists, surrendering immediately after being discovered.
Are you... really an Ascendant?
What's the alternative? I'm not the fighting type... I'll probably hurt myself if I try.
If you're surrendering, then tell us the way through the chasm.
Heh... Isn't going after the Polyphage... more terrifying than death?
You can let me know after you die here.
Come on! I'm just joking—joking! Can you please, just please don't go toting your gun around, please...
It won't help if I tell you anyway. The blockade here can only be disabled by an Ascendant, which means I'm coming with you!
From what Strike Hawk reported, not only can she disguise herself, she can also turn invisible using optical camouflage, and vanish when we're distracted.
I'm not going to run... Definitely not...
And I definitely trust you. Liv, don't we have the mountaineering steel wire from the Support Force?
...Hey! What is this—
It hurts! That's my tailfin! Have you Babylonians never learned how to properly tie up a mermaid?!
I-I'm sorry... This is the first time I've seen a mermaid...
Don't apologize. Here, tighter.
Oh dear brother, it hurts so much... Please, let me go!
Ouch! Ouch! OUCH! Why is it getting tighter, my brother—
I'll remove all your scales if you pretend to be Murray again.
F-fine... Sorry.
After you finally tie Lamia up, you hear another massive quake coming from the underground cavern.
Seems like... you didn't make it in time. Oops...
Is that... Luna?!
Let's investigate the epicenter of that quake. Liv, stay in the back and keep your eyes on Lamia. Get moving, mermaid.
I'm moving, I'm moving! Gentler, please!
